name: VirtualGrandchild
0:
”Alexa, open Virtual Grandchild”
”Alexa, start Virtual Grandchild”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: virtual grandchild
des:
Just tell the skill what you want to. She's a great listener. You'll always get an answer until you tell her to stop.
This skill is based on a great sketch by SNL, whom we're forever grateful to for coming up with this great idea.
We're not trying to make any money off this, it's just for fun and maybe some free advertising.
The icon is straight out of the sketch, we'll get in touch with SNL to make sure they're fine with it.
